name: Dragon's Den
longDesc: A fearsome sight, a dragon. One you had not hoped to see from this close up. It rests fitfully here in this large, domed chamber, smoke trailing from it's glowing nostrils. It must have been here a while, it certainly looks to have grown too large to fit through any of the doors.
shortDesc: A room where a dragon slumbers.

shelves.name: Charred Boots
shelves.desc: A pair of charred boots stand in front of the wall where the outline of a person remains scortched on the stone.

shelves.name: Dragon's Egg Shell
shelves.desc: The broken remains of the dragon's egg.

doors.name: Scorched Door
doors.desc: The heavy, stone door is completely scorched on the inside from the dragon's fiery breath.  The iron, shining brightly as it drips to the floor.
doors.unlock_desc: The door is open and you can see the Nexus safely on the otherside.

doors.name: Golden Stone Door
doors.desc: Another stone door lays in front of you. Gold inlay once adorning the door has melted and burned deeper into the stone. Fortunately, the keyhole that also forged out of gold and stone has remained intact.  Now if only you had the key.
doors.unlock_desc: You push the door ever-so-slowly trying to be as quiet as possible.  You know the dragon is sleeping, but you aren't sure how long your spell will hold.
